allow: Bash(/c/Program Files/nodejs/node.exe -e "let d='''';process.stdin.on\(''data'',c=>d+=c\);process.stdin.on\(''end'',\(\)=>{const j=JSON.parse\(d\);const wf=JSON.parse\(j[0].text\);const nodes=wf.nodes;console.log\(''=== WORKFLOW: ''+wf.name+'' ===''\);console.log\(''Nodes count:'',nodes.length\);nodes.forEach\(\(n,i\)=>console.log\(i+'': [''+n.type+''] ''+n.name\)\);console.log\(''\\n=== CONNECTIONS ===''\);console.log\(JSON.stringify\(wf.connections,null,2\).substring\(0,5000\)\)}\)")

Bash(/c/Program Files/nodejs/node.exe -e "const fs=require\(''fs''\);const d=JSON.parse\(fs.readFileSync\(''C:/Users/netn1/.claude/projects/c--Users-netn1-Downloads-amazpen/c30b40a5-90b5-40d0-a49f-59546424a809/tool-results/mcp-n8n-mcp-n8n_get_workflow-1769597453997.txt'',''utf8''\)\);const wf=JSON.parse\(d[0].text\);const nodes=wf.data.nodes||wf.nodes||[];const targets=[''Loop Over Items'',''Create an object12'',''Switch'',''Code in JavaScript''];const found=nodes.filter\(n=>targets.includes\(n.name\)\);found.forEach\(n=>console.log\(JSON.stringify\(n,null,2\).substring\(0,3000\)\)\);console.log\(''---TOTAL NODES:'',nodes.length\)")

Bash(/c/Program Files/nodejs/node.exe -e "let d='''';process.stdin.on\(''data'',c=>d+=c\);process.stdin.on\(''end'',\(\)=>{const j=JSON.parse\(d\)[0];const ex=JSON.parse\(j.text\);console.log\(''Status:'',ex.data.status\);console.log\(''Finished:'',ex.data.finished\);console.log\(''Duration:'',ex.data.stoppedAt&&ex.data.startedAt?\(new Date\(ex.data.stoppedAt\)-new Date\(ex.data.startedAt\)\)/1000+''s'':''N/A''\);console.log\(''Total nodes:'',ex.data.summary.totalNodes\);console.log\(''Total items processed:'',ex.data.summary.totalItems\);console.log\(''\\nNode execution summary:''\);const nodes=ex.data.data.resultData.runData||{};Object.keys\(nodes\).slice\(0,15\).forEach\(n=>{const runs=nodes[n];const lastRun=runs[runs.length-1];console.log\(''-'',n+'':'',lastRun.executionStatus||''success'',''-'',lastRun.data?.main?.[0]?.length||0,''items''\)}\)}\)")

Bash(# The realtime-dev tenant exists. The Kong routes to /realtime/v1/* which hits the realtime service. # The client connects with the tenant subdomain or the default tenant. # In self-hosted mode with SEED_SELF_HOST=true, the tenant is ''realtime-dev''. # The Kong kong.yml routes /realtime/v1/ to http://realtime-dev.realtime:4000/ # Let''s check what the Kong config looks like for realtime curl -s ""http://187.77.79.122:3000/api/compose.one?composeId=7UvqmW3-EhblzODrn9svd"" -H ""x-api-key: RsvyoMZPRkHlJHCIMnJuPdhrEosgUXNVhVSilmdnahIpPTgTeapjonZOVMQyRrfZ"")

Bash(# Check if the realtime health endpoint works \(through Kong, without websocket upgrade\) curl -s ""http://amazpen-supabase-b85726-187-77-79-122.traefik.me/realtime/v1/"" -H ""apikey: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE3NzExNTM2NTMsImV4cCI6MTg5MzQ1NjAwMCwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSJ9.ygmKRKRXiEq03Om5K8xeWY6wkqnrZvntIhHoR_m81ik"")

Bash(# Test the websocket endpoint specifically curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""websocket: %{http_code}\\n"" ""http://amazpen-supabase-b85726-187-77-79-122.traefik.me/realtime/v1/websocket?apikey=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE3NzExNTM2NTMsImV4cCI6MTg5MzQ1NjAwMCwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSJ9.ygmKRKRXiEq03Om5K8xeWY6wkqnrZvntIhHoR_m81ik&vsn=2.0.0"" -H ""Upgrade: websocket"" -H ""Connection: Upgrade"" -H ""Sec-WebSocket-Version: 13"" -H ""Sec-WebSocket-Key: dGhlIHNhbXBsZSBub25jZQ=="" # Also try without upgrade headers to see what we get curl -s ""http://amazpen-supabase-b85726-187-77-79-122.traefik.me/realtime/v1/websocket?apikey=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE3NzExNTM2NTMsImV4cCI6MTg5MzQ1NjAwMCwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSJ9.ygmKRKRXiEq03Om5K8xeWY6wkqnrZvntIhHoR_m81ik&vsn=2.0.0"")

Bash(# Check what path Realtime actually gets - test without websocket upgrade curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""%{http_code}"" ""http://amazpen-supabase-b85726-187-77-79-122.traefik.me/realtime/v1/websocket?apikey=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE3NzExNTM2NTMsImV4cCI6MTg5MzQ1NjAwMCwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSJ9.ygmKRKRXiEq03Om5K8xeWY6wkqnrZvntIhHoR_m81ik&vsn=2.0.0"" echo """" # Also try the longpoll transport \(HTTP fallback\) curl -s ""http://amazpen-supabase-b85726-187-77-79-122.traefik.me/realtime/v1/websocket/longpoll?apikey=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE3NzExNTM2NTMsImV4cCI6MTg5MzQ1NjAwMCwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSJ9.ygmKRKRXiEq03Om5K8xeWY6wkqnrZvntIhHoR_m81ik&vsn=2.0.0"")
